name: Overall Performance
query: SELECT participants.purple_agent AS id, ROUND(r.average_score * 100, 1) AS "Score (%)", ROUND(r.accuracy * 100, 1) AS "Accuracy (%)", r.num_evaluated AS "Tasks", r.num_successful AS "Passed" FROM (SELECT participants, results[1] AS r FROM results) ORDER BY r.average_score DESC

name: By Dataset
query: SELECT participants.purple_agent AS id, ROUND(r.by_dataset.bizfinbench.mean_score * 100, 1) AS "BizFinBench (%)", ROUND(r.by_dataset.public_csv.mean_score * 100, 1) AS "CSV (%)", ROUND(r.by_dataset.options.mean_score * 100, 1) AS "Options (%)" FROM (SELECT participants, results[1] AS r FROM results) ORDER BY r.average_score DESC
